title: Fright Night - Volume 2
description: Fright Night - Volume 2 is the second collection dedicated to your Horror Projects.
longDescription:
• Preview the collection: Youtube


"Fright Night - Volume 2" is the second collection dedicated to your Horror Projects.

More than 2 hours of music, 20 unique themes from terror music, survival, spooky backgrounds, high impact cinematic visuals, aggressive and dissonant horror trailer.

Inspired by the haunted music under your favorite RPG, sci-fi, action or survival horror videogame and influenced by Hollywood blockbusters like thrillers, drama, horror, action, stealth and in general, dark projects.


This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements. 

Including 123 loops and 82 short edits for further usage.


Track list:


  • Don't Move Or You Die: Full length (01:20), 4 Short edits, 9 Loops 
  • Walking Death: Full length (01:24), 4 Short edits, 8 Loops
  • Death Around The Clock: Full length (01:10), 4 Short edits, 10 Loops
  • Abandoned Cemetery: Full length (01:32), 4 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Death Sentence: Full length (01:27), 4 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Deeper Than A Nightmare: Full length (02:20), 4 Short edits, 8 Loops
  • Evil Animals: Full length (01:39), 4 Short edits, 7 Loops
  • Loud Silence: Full length (01:42), 4 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • One Of These Nights: Full length (02:21), 4 Short edits, 3 Loops
  • Polluted Atmosphere: Full length (01:36), 4 Short edits, 8 Loops
  • Sick Air: Full length (01:56), 4 Short edits, 8 Loops
  • Shivering From Hell: Full length (02:12), 4 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Exploring Haunted Places: Full length (01:27), 4 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Ethereal Darkness: Full length (02:21), 5 Short edits, 7 Loops
  • Surrend To Darkness: Full length (01:40), 4 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Tension Underneath: Full length (01:27), 4 Short edits, 6 Loops
  • There Can Be Only Fear: Full length (01:29), 4 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Crooked Butterflies: Full length (01:28), 4 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Sweet Halloween: Full length (01:16), 4 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Toothless Zombie: Full length (00:42), 5 Short edits, 5 Loops


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Also take a look: Fright Night - Vol.1 and Phobia - Vol.1
technicalDetails:
Features:


  • 20 Full length tracks
  • 82 Short edits
  • 123 Loops


Number of Audio Wavs: 225

Number of Audio Cues: 225

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does Music Loop: Yes

Minutes of Audio Provided: 2:04:30

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All



- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
